section.section: Before a county may designate a blighted area or financed area that lies wholly or partly in a municipal corporation, the municipal corporation shall consent to the designation of the part of the area that is within the municipal corporation.
Before a municipal corporation may designate a blighted area or financed area, the county that contains the area shall consent to the designation.
Consent under this subsection shall be made by ordinance or administrative resolution.

text.section:
A political subdivision that issues a bond as a qualified redevelopment bond under the Internal Revenue Code shall comply with federal law in determining:
the designated blighted area and the financed area to which the bond relates; and
any other designated blighted areas in the political subdivision.
